ygData.subject: Helloooooo EQ Rainbow!
ygData.msgSnippet: So i ve only been playing EQ a month and have had an absolute blast. to say that I m sucked into it is an understatement. So I had this great idea to form a
ygData.messageBody:
So i've only been playing EQ a month and have had an absolute blast.
to say that I'm sucked into it is an understatement.

So I had this great idea to form a gay guild... and who knew?? Some
other really cool person already thought of it.

As a newbie though I have some questions!

How do you form a guild on your server?
How do you join a guild already in place?

Currently I play on test server (wanted a low volumne server to get
familiar with the game) and could easily start on another server if I
knew I could hook up with some other gay friendly folks!

Lemme know!
Chris
